level.text: 2309.1 A firearm shall not be registered if the applicant meets any of theollowing conditions:

The existence of a record described in § 2307.1 showing a conviction whichakes a person ineligible to possess a pistol under D.C. Official Code §2-4503 (2013 Supp.) shall establish that the person is disqualified fromossessing a rifle or shotgun under § 203(a)(9) of the Act;

A court record showing the applicant is a respondent in an intrafamilyroceeding in which a civil protection order was issued against the applicant,nless the applicant can demonstrate by a certified court record establishinghat the order has expired or has been rescinded for a period of five (5) years;

Official Code § 16-1041(2) (2012 Repl.))as issued against the applicant, unless the applicant can demonstrate by aertified court record establishing that the order has expired or has beenescinded for a period of five (5) years;
